content: KWIK-CON II Screw anchor Setting tools and accessories for the Kwik-Con + and Kwik-Con II+ screw anchors ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Inserts- - - ### FEATURES:Features Tools for the installation of a variety of Kwik-Con II+ head styles: Torx® hex washer head, Torx® or Phillips flat head Matched tolerance carbide-tipped drill bits for more consistent and reliable performance Exclusive internal Torx® drive Applications Installing Kwik-Con + and Kwik-Con II+ self-tapping screw anchors for concrete and masonry applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: N/A Head configuration: N/A Material composition: N/A Technical Data | Material, corrosion | N/A | Head configuration | N/A | Material composition | N/A ### ITEMS- 235101 - Insert bit holder/depth locator KC II+ - Package Size 1 pc - 235100 - Hex setter/depth locator 5/16 KC II+ - Package Size 1 pc - 235098 - Hex driver KC II+ - Package Size 1 pc - 235097 - Hex driver deluxe kit KC II+ - Package Size 1 pc
